name.desc: Used to specify the name of the control; Useful if dealing with forms submitted directly to a URL
name.desc_cn: 用于指定控件的名称；如果处理直接提交到URL的表单，则非常有用

size.desc: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)
size.desc_cn: 以CSS单位表示的大小，包括单位名称或标准大小名称（xs | sm | md | lg | xl）

model-value.desc: Any number to indicate the given value of the knob. Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use the v-model directive

min.desc: The minimum value that the model (the knob value) should start at
min.desc_cn: 模型（旋钮值）应开始的最小值

max.desc: The maximum value that the model (the knob value) should go to
max.desc_cn: 模型（旋钮值）应达到的最大值

inner-min.desc: Inner minimum value of the model; Use in case you need the model value to be inside of the track's min-max values; Needs to be higher or equal to 'min' prop; Defaults to 'min' prop

inner-max.desc: Inner maximum value of the model; Use in case you need the model value to be inside of the track's min-max values; Needs to be lower or equal to 'max' prop; Defaults to 'max' prop

step.desc: A number representing steps in the value of the model, while adjusting the knob
step.desc_cn: 在调整旋钮时，表示模型值的步数

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc_cn: 组件的来自Quasar调色板的颜色名称

center-color.desc: Color name for the center part of the component from the Quasar Color Palette
center-color.desc_cn: 组件中心部分的来自Quasar调色板的颜色名称

track-color.desc: Color name for the track of the component from the Quasar Color Palette
track-color.desc_cn: 组件进展的来自Quasar调色板的颜色名称

font-size.desc: Size of text in CSS units, including unit name. Suggestion: use 'em' units to sync with component size
font-size.desc_cn: 以CSS单位表示的文本大小，包括单位名称。建议：使用“em”单位与组件大小同步

thickness.desc: Thickness of progress arc as a ratio (0.0 < x < 1.0) of component size
thickness.desc_cn: 进度弧厚度与组件尺寸之比（0.0<x<1.0）

angle.desc: Angle to rotate progress arc by

show-value.desc: Enables the default slot and uses it (if available), otherwise it displays the 'value' prop as text; Make sure the text has enough space to be displayed inside the component
show-value.desc_cn: 启用默认插槽并使用它（如果可用），否则它会将“value”属性显示为文本；确保文本有足够的空间显示在组件内部

default.desc: Default slot in the devland unslotted content of the component
default.desc_cn: 组件的devland unslotted内容中的默认插槽

update:model-value.desc: Emitted when the component needs to change the model; Is also used by v-model

change.desc: Fires at the end of a knob's adjustment and offers the value of the model
change.desc_cn: 在旋钮调整结束时发出并提供模型的值

drag-value.desc: The value of the model while dragging is still in progress
drag-value.desc_cn: 拖动仍在进行中时模型的值
